Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.

We implemented more improvements! This time you will see a beautiful renovated design.
Now there's a news feed section! Here you can keep yourself up to date.
We have included new and exclusive items in the shop. They are updated daily, don't miss out on them!
Get ready, focus, find a comfy spot, charge your cell phone battery... because the day has finally come: new collections, more levels! We hope you enjoy them!
Adventures have no limits! Now you can complete multiple missions at once, you won't have to unlock them anymore! Start this new trip right now!

We implemented more improvements! This time you will see a beautiful renovated design.
Now there's a news feed section! Here you can keep yourself up to date.
We have included new and exclusive items in the shop. They are updated daily, don't miss out on them!

Our Trivies deserve a little extra attention, that's why we totally renovated the collection's appearance!
And, of course, we fixed some bugs.

We all love receiving gifts, and we want you to feel the love every day!
That's why we include a daily gift in the store. Quick, go open it!
We also think that everybody deserves another opportunity. Now you have more chances to win when answering a question!
We made a small but beautiful change our home page. Can you notice it?

We implemented more improvements! This time you will see a beautiful renovated design.
Now there's a news feed section! Here you can keep yourself up to date.
We have included new and exclusive items in the shop. They are updated daily, don't miss out on them!

We have included new and exclusive items in the shop. They are updated daily, don't miss out on them!

Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time.
We also implemented some minor improvements for the missions.
True heroes must keep their goals in mind if they want to reach them, that's why we thought it was time to improve the missions' look and feel. Go get 'em!
Get ready, focus, find a comfy spot, charge your cell phone battery... because the day has finally come: new collections, more levels! We hope you enjoy them!

A good farmer always prepares the field for the new crops, removes some bugs and makes improvements to the ground.
Just like us, but instead of seeds we plant challenges.
Soon you will see the new sprouts!

Your adventures have no limits! Missions aren't weekly anymore, now you can get prizes every couple of hours. Start this new trip right away!

How spooky! We dressed up for the gloomiest night of the year. Prepare your scary outfit and join the Halloween fun.

Prepare the cannons, sailor! We're about to land in a new pirate adventure and we need your knowledge to sink the enemy ships. Weigh the anchors, bring your parrot, adjust your eye patch, because we are setting sail!
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.

A while ago we started walking paths of fun, learning and growth. We're very happy to celebrate our first year with you. Trivia Crack 2's team wants to thank you for accompanying us. We have big plans ahead! Now come to discover the surprises that we have to you. You're our honor guest in this awesome party!
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.

Oh, no! Our friends are in danger and you have to help them.
Introducing the new game mode Rescue Rush: be quick, be strategic, be the hero.

Oh, no! Our friends are in danger and you have to help them.
Introducing the new game mode Rescue Rush: be quick, be strategic, be the hero.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.

The most magical moment of the year just started and we got in the wonderful Christmas mood!
-Get ready to celebrate with unique decorations
-Check out our limited-time festive wheel only available during December!
Your Classic matches are now going to be magnificent!

The most magical moment of the year just started and we got in the wonderful Christmas mood!
-Get ready to celebrate with unique decorations

Your Classic matches are now going to be magnificent!
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Friends will be friends! We introduce a new way to add friends so you never stop playing with them.
The sweetest day in the year arrived to Trivia Crack 2, and we want to celebrate with a unique Valentine's Day roulette. Never forget that love is the right answer.
Did you say wheels? These are unique collectible pieces of art. Isn't it beautiful to see them spin and spin?

What comes to mind when you think of beautiful colors, joyful music, dancing and spectacular costumes? Yes, that's it! Carnival is here and we have an incredible wheel to celebrate it here at Trivia Crack 2! We also added more levels to keep climbing in the ranking!

We love to celebrate friendship and that's why you'll now receive cool prizes when you invite your pals. But wait, there's more! There are new pieces in Lucky Spin and Lucky Spin Premium. Try your luck!
We introduce a new catalogue of topics in Daily Challenge. This is the moment to show how much do you know about your favorites topics.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Chocolate makes everybody happy and we love celebrate easter. We have a new special wheel and lot of fun! Grab a chocolate bar and come to play! Happy Easter!

We know some questions are really hard to answer... that's why we mix some rare spices, a pinch of sugar and the colors of the rainbow to create this potent power up that we call Magic Answer.
And... oh! What's that shiny thing? It's the new Deluxe Event, special for VIP members.

Playing with friends is awesome! We totally renew Tower Duels and now you can play with them anytime.
We also added new topics in Daily Challenge so you can continue breaking those streaks.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.
We loved Magic Answer as you loved it. That's why now you can get them by spinning the Premium Lucky Spin wheel or by opening the Piggy Bank. What are you waiting for? Go get them!
This is the beginning of a new era in Trivia Crack 2's competition: give a huge welcome to Leagues! Your knowledge and effort now have amazing prices.
We added a new wheel to keep you playing. The most important thing now is to stay safe at home. Discover it!
Phew! Good thing we fixed those bugs in time. We also implemented some visual improvements.

We are celebrating our nature with an amazing wheel, and remember: always take care of our planet. Even with little actions, we are helping the environment.

We polish those diamonds to make them shine.
Oh, so fancy! We included a luxurious wheel for our sophisticated VIP members.

There is no more fun time than summer time!
Get your summer wheel and take a dip in the pool, but make sure you leave your mobile phone in a dry place.
We implemented more improvements! This time you will see a beautiful renovated shop design. Go shopping!

Friends will be friends! Celebrate this day with them and a new friendly wheel!

Isn't this roulette purrfect? We celebrate the International Cat Day with the softer wheel ever!

It's time to complete those wheels!
Now you can buy Legendary Chests in the store and get the cards you need to complete that wheel you wish.
Buy it, open it, complete it!

Winning prizes has never been so easy! With the Trivia Pass you'll get incredible prizes per season.
All your correct answers will add to your progress to unlock special chests, gold bars, power ups and wonderful wheels.
Wow! A new game mode awaits you to test your knowledge and courage. Open up that mysterious door and start the adventure!
Luxury, glow, elegance. Premium! Play Pick-A-Prize in its most exquisite version: five totally safe initial stages where you can get excellent prizes.

You've already opened many Mystery Doors, but now you must find a way to enter the Treasure Room: go on the adventure of finding all the keys. A great treasure awaits you!

We dress up for the occasion, we have great discounts for you and a beautiful wheel in the Trivia Pass.
